import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { Context } from '../../../../context' import useValue from '../../../../hooks/useValue' const Time = () => { const { today, calendarDate, darkMode, setCalendarModal } = useContext(Context) const [calendarDateSelected, setCalendarDateSelected] = useValue(false) useEffect(() => { setCalendarDateSelected(true) }, [calendarDate]) console.log(calendarDate) // console.log(calendarDateSelected) return (
Now on the clock
{today.toLocaleTimeString()}
) } export default Time
